/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves forming a verdant canopy overhead. A few cars are parked along the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a unique perspective that emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are rich and vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the towering trees and the vast sky.
